text:
What can I say... Nesli is the best host ever! The room was so clean and arranged when I got there. She was very welcoming and attentive to settle me in, and showed me all the best places around and where to find a supermarket, which is really close by the way.

The house is in a great neighborhood, Dumbo, and 3 minute walking to the F line subway, which will take you to the centre of Manhattan in 15 minutes. 

The house is very clean and it has a great living room and kitchen with everything you need to cook, and a clean and spacious bathroom. 

Thank you Nesli for everything and I will be staying a lot more time :)
title: Great Room in Dumbo Brooklyn
